page.title: 06SPORT IN WARBOYS
page.content: In Warboys there are quite a few sports clubs centred around the sports field,with its own{football,cricket and{hockey }clubs.There is a sports and social club situated on the ground as well,with its own{darts}and {pool} teams.There is a Community school in which there are {martial arts}clubs,{ {badminton }clubs and a {table tennis club.There is a playground on which the small children can play.There is also a{bowls}club,a {darts }club and a {pool}club in the public houses.There is also an {angling }club near the old brickworks.48% of the children in the school take part in a sports club of some kind. {ANGLING CLUB } The{Angling}Club has twenty two members.It is a private club and the council excavated a pond near the brickworks which they use.
